import { useState } from "react" import { useImmer } from "use-immer" import cl from '../styles/FolderScreen.module.css' const FolderScreen = (props) =>{ const [value, setValue] = useState('') const n = props.notesInFolders.filter((el) => el.id == props.sd) return(
{setValue(e.target.value)}}>
{n.map(n=>n.notes.map(e=>))}
) } export default FolderScreen
